description: one of twelve paintings of court officials on bamboo pith, placed in a red silk bound folio volume; painting has been removed from folio and mounted and matted; woman in green robe with pink sleeves embroidered with dragon, clouds and bats; long blue vest with gold embroidery; long skirt under robe blue embroidered with pink flowers and pleated; headdress tall crown-like and embroidered
title: Untitled [court official]
